name: Carrot and Papaya Smoothie With Hazelnuts and Pistachios
description: The carrot and the nuts contribute great texture and substance to this smoothie, and the coconut ice cubes add great flavor.
recipeCategory: breakfast, easy, quick, shakes and smoothies
keywords: carrot, coconut milk, papaya, dairy-free, gluten-free, healthy, high fiber, low cholesterol, low-sodium, vegan, vegetarian
recipeIngredient: 1 cup diced ripe papaya (6 ounces/ 180 grams)
1 small carrot, peeled and chopped (1 1/2 to 2 ounces / 45 to 60 grams)
2 low-fat coconut milk ice cubes (3 tablespoons low-fat coconut milk)
1 slice ginger, peeled and coarsely chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Place the hazelnuts in a 300-degree oven and toast for 15 to 20 minutes. Remove from the heat, wrap in a towel and rub the towel against your counter to rub off the skins.
Place all of the ingredients in a blender and blend at high speed for a full minute. Pour into a glass and enjoy.
